page.title: 04EDUCATION SCHOOL CONCERT
page.content: On 17th,July 1985 we had a concert for the four children who are going on to secondary schools.The children organ- ised the programme themselves.In the first half we sang songs,played our recorders and read some items from our cattle project.After that we per- formed BEANSTALK 1999,which was about the difficulties of keeping a cow in a council flat.We had a pantomime cow, Martians,tango dancers,a golden goose, a Mayor, a farmer,a narrator and Jack. At the end the Rector said a prayer. Parents, friends and School Governors formed the audience.Everybody said they had enjoyed it very much and gave us lots of applause.The infants were allowed to take home the Martian head- gear they had made.We had a background of Jack and the Beanstalk and an enormous giant.
